item.title: 通知称波音与 Spirit Aero 的交易最早可能在下周一完成
item.description: 根据纽约证券交易所的通知，波音公司对 Spirit AeroSystems 公司的收购计划最早可能于下周一完成，这家航空结构巨头的交易将于 12 月 8 日暂停。【原文：Boeing's planned acquisition of Spirit AeroSystems could close as early as Monday, according to a New York Stock Exchange notice that says trading of the aerostructure giant is set to be suspended on December 8.】

item.title: 独家：Netflix 如何赢得好莱坞最大奖项--华纳兄弟发现奖
item.description: 直接了解该交易的人士告诉路透社，Netflix 最初只是执行一项实况调查任务，最终却达成了过去十年中最大的媒体交易之一，并将重塑全球娱乐业的格局。【原文：What started as a fact-finding mission for Netflix culminated in one of the biggest media deals in the last decade and one that stands to reshape the global entertainment business landscape, people with direct knowledge of the deal told Reuters.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟与 Netflix 720 亿美元的交易让媒体巨头的表现成为焦点
item.description: 华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros Discovery）已同意以 720 亿美元的价格将其标志性的工作室和流媒体资产出售给 Netflix，此举将重塑好莱坞，打造一个垂直整合的媒体巨头。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery has agreed to sell its iconic studio and streaming assets to Netflix for $72 billion, in a move that will reshape Hollywood by creating a vertically integrated media powerhouse.】

item.title: 好莱坞工会对 Netflix 以 720 亿美元收购华纳兄弟感到震惊
item.description: 好莱坞工会和影院业主周五对 Netflix 拟以 720 亿美元收购华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros Discovery）一事敲响了警钟，他们警告说，如果该交易通过监管部门的审查，将会削减工作岗位、集中权力并减少影院的电影发行量。【原文：Hollywood unions and theater owners on Friday sounded the alarm over Netflix's proposed $72 billion takeover of Warner Bros Discovery, warning the deal would cut jobs, concentrate power and reduce theatrical movie releases if the deal passes regulatory review.】

item.title: 精神航空公司取消解雇多达 365 名飞行员的计划
item.description: 精神航空公司（Spirit Airlines）周五表示，该公司已经取消了明年第一季度解雇多达 365 名飞行员的计划，并缩减了机长降级的规模，这是该公司 8 月份申请破产保护后重组工作的一部分。【原文：Spirit Airlines said on Friday it has scrapped plans to furlough up to 365 pilots in the first quarter next year and scaled back a downgrade of captains, which were part of restructuring efforts after it filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection in August.】

item.title: Waymo 将就自动驾驶汽车驶过停靠的校车发布召回公告
item.description: Waymo周五表示，将对其自动驾驶汽车进行召回，因为德克萨斯州官员称，自开学以来，在有记录的事件中，Alphabet旗下的自动驾驶汽车至少19次非法超越校车。【原文：Waymo said Friday it would issue a recall for its self-driving vehicles after Texas officials said the Alphabet unit's vehicles had illegally passed school buses at least 19 times in recorded incidents since the start of the school year.】

item.title: 按揭、现购现付公司将在美国消费者监督小组会议上发言
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份议程，美国消费者金融保护局将于下周召集其消费者专家顾问小组，讨论终止反歧视政策，以及最近提出的缩小民权时代公平借贷法规的建议，以及其他近期政策变化。【原文：The U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau will next week convene its expert consumer advisory panel to discuss ending anti-discrimination policies, and a recent proposal to narrow civil-rights-era fair lending regulations, among other recent policy changes, according to an agenda seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 美国立法者要求谷歌和苹果移除追踪移民特工的应用程序
item.description: 众议院国土安全委员会已要求谷歌和苹果公司详细说明它们正在采取哪些措施来移除允许用户跟踪联邦移民官员的移动应用程序。【原文：The House Committee on Homeland Security has asked Google and Apple to detail what steps they are taking to remove mobile applications that allow users to track federal immigration officers.】

item.title: 百威英博将以 4.9 亿美元收购饮料制造商 BeatBox 85% 的股份
item.description: 安海斯-布希英博（Anheuser-Busch InBev）周五表示，计划以约 4.9 亿美元的价格收购美国即饮饮料品牌 BeatBox 的多数股权。【原文：Anheuser-Busch InBev on Friday said it plans to acquire a majority stake in the U.S.-based ready-to-drink beverage brand BeatBox for about $490 million.】

item.title: 美国监管机构放宽银行杠杆贷款指引
item.description: 美国货币监理署（U.S. Office of the Comptroller of the Currency）和联邦存款保险公司（Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation）周五表示，他们将撤销十多年前发布的关于杠杆贷款的指导意见，此举促进了私人信贷的增长。【原文：The U.S. Office of the Comptroller of the Currency and the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation said on Friday they are withdrawing their guidance on leveraged lending issued more than a decade ago, a move that contributed to the rise of private credit.】

item.title: 从 "伊卡洛斯虫 "到有缺陷的面板：空客计算依赖单一机型的代价
item.description: 本周，空中客车公司得到了一个残酷的提醒：即使是世界上交付量最大的喷气式飞机--A320--也无法避免太阳耀斑和有缺陷的金属等各种冲击。【原文：This week, Airbus got a brutal reminder that even the world’s most-delivered jet - the A320 - isn’t immune to shocks as disparate as solar flares and flawed metal.】

item.title: Meta 收购人工智能可穿戴设备初创公司 Limitless
item.description: Meta 收购了人工智能可穿戴设备初创公司 Limitless，该公司生产一种吊坠式设备，可记录和转录现实世界中的对话。【原文：Meta has acquired AI-wearables startup Limitless, maker of a pendant-style device that records and transcribes real-world conversations, as the social media giant doubles down on efforts to build AI-enabled consumer hardware.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：SpaceX 正在洽谈出售股份，估值将升至 8000 亿美元
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周五援引熟悉内情的人士的话报道，SpaceX 公司正在启动二次股票出售，该火箭制造商的估值将达到 8000 亿美元。【原文：SpaceX is kicking off a secondary share sale that would value the rocket-maker at $800 billion, the Wall Street Journal reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 消息人士称，软银正在洽谈收购数字基础设施公司 DigitalBridge
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的消息人士周五告诉路透社，软银正在洽谈收购数字基础设施公司DigitalBridge，这家日本企业集团正试图开发该公司与人工智能相关的产品组合。【原文：SoftBank is in talks to acquire digital infrastructure firm DigitalBridge , a source familiar with the matter told Reuters on Friday, as the Japanese conglomerate seeks to tap the firm's AI-linked portfolio.】

item.title: 泛欧交易所称，玛格南冰淇淋上市参考价定为 12.80 欧元
item.description: 泛欧交易所周五在一份通知中说，马格南冰淇淋公司周一首次上市的参考价定为每股 12.80 欧元（14.89 美元）。【原文：The Magnum Ice Cream Company's reference price was set at 12.80 euros ($14.89) per share for its stock market debut on Monday, Euronext said in a notice on Friday.】

item.title: 高盛称，AI 信贷问题在投资级和高收益率市场的表现不同
item.description: 根据高盛（Goldman Sachs）的最新研究，投资者对人工智能相关债务激增的焦虑在投资级债券和高收益债券中的表现各不相同。【原文：Investor anxiety about the surge in AI-related debt is playing out differently across investment grade and high yield bonds, according to new research from Goldman Sachs.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，瑞士政府将淡化部分瑞银资本规则
item.description: 三位熟悉内情的人士称，瑞士政府将软化银行业监管方案的部分内容，这可能迫使瑞银增加多达 240 亿美元的资本。【原文：The Swiss government is set to soften part of a banking regulation package that could force UBS to add as much as $24 billion in capital, three people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: Netflix 与华纳兄弟的交易面临反垄断的反对，尽管该公司大肆宣扬其好处
item.description: 周五，Netflix 宣称其 720 亿美元收购华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros Discovery）的电影公司和流媒体部门符合唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的竞争执法机构的优先考虑事项，但这一收购将受到严格的反垄断审查。【原文：Netflix pitched its $72 billion acquisition of Warner Bros Discovery's studios and streaming division as aligned with the priorities of President Donald Trump's competition enforcers on Friday, but intense antitrust scrutiny is all but guaranteed.】

item.title: 欧洲继续打击大科技公司，向特朗普开出 "X "罚单
item.description: 欧洲正在继续打击大型科技公司，对 Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司和埃隆-马斯克的 X 公司处以罚款，并展开新的调查，维护其执行法律的主权权利，以对抗美国总统唐纳德-特朗普。【原文：Europe is forging ahead with its crackdown on Big Tech, levying fines on Alphabet's Google and Elon Musk's X and opening new investigations, asserting its sovereign right to enforce its laws in defiance of U.S. President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 美国消费者情绪在 12 月初有所改善
item.description: 周五的一项调查显示，12月初美国消费者情绪有所改善，但对高物价和劳动力市场的担忧依然存在。【原文：U.S. consumer sentiment improved in early December, but worries about high prices and the labor market persisted, a survey showed on Friday.】

item.title: 美国 9 月份消费者支出放缓
item.description: 9 月份，美国消费者支出略有增长，表明第三季度末，由于劳动力市场不景气和生活成本上升抑制了需求，美国经济失去了增长势头。【原文：U.S. consumer spending increased marginally in September, suggesting a loss of momentum in the economy at the end of the third quarter as a lackluster labor market and rising cost of living curbed demand.】

item.title: 华尔街一周前瞻 美联储内部分歧聚焦鲍威尔的利率指导和异议
item.description: 下周的美联储会议预计将是多年来最有争议的会议之一，投资者关注的焦点是决策者在降息预期上的分歧有多大，以及主席鲍威尔对未来道路发出的信号。【原文：The Federal Reserve meeting next week is expected to be one of its most contentious in years, and investors are focused on how divided policymakers are over an expected interest-rate cut and what Chair Jerome Powell signals about the path ahead.】

item.title: 美国官员谴责欧盟对马斯克 X 的罚款，称欧洲在向美国人征税
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会主席周五谴责欧盟对埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的社交媒体公司 X 的罚款，称其违反了欧盟的网络内容规定。【原文：The chairman of the U.S. Federal Communications Commission denounced the EU's fine of Elon Musk's social media company X on Friday for breaching EU online content rules.】

item.title: 达美航空公司下令底特律机场航班停飞
item.description: 达美航空公司周五以技术连接问题为由，宣布底特律机场所有航班停飞。【原文：Delta Air Lines issued a ground stop for all its flights at Detroit airport on Friday, citing a technical connectivity issue.】

item.title: 纽约时报》起诉 Perplexity AI "非法 "复制内容
item.description: 纽约时报》周五对 Perplexity AI 提起诉讼，称这家人工智能初创公司未经许可复制、传播和展示其数百万篇文章。【原文：The New York Times filed a lawsuit against Perplexity AI on Friday, claiming that the artificial intelligence startup was copying, distributing and displaying millions of its articles without permission.】

item.title: 据 CNBC 报道，派拉蒙 Skydance 出价每股 30 美元收购华纳兄弟发现公司
item.description: 据 CNBC 周五援引消息人士的话报道，派拉蒙 Skydance 曾以每股 30 美元的价格收购华纳兄弟发现公司。【原文：Paramount Skydance had offered $30 per share for Warner Bros Discovery , CNBC reported on Friday, citing sources.】

item.title: Trustpilot 因摩根士丹利评级上调而大涨，尽管有卖空者索赔
item.description: 上周五，摩根士丹利将 Trustpilot 的股票评级上调两档至 "增持"，一天后，美国做空机构 Grizzly Research 将矛头对准了这家全球点评平台，随后 Trustpilot 股价大涨 16%。【原文：Trustpilot shares surged 16% after Morgan Stanley upgraded the stock by two notches to "overweight" on Friday, a day after U.S. short seller Grizzly Research took aim at the global review platform.】

item.title: 苹果公司向 84 个国家的用户发送新一轮网络威胁通知
item.description: 苹果公司周五表示，该公司已向 84 个国家的用户发送了新一轮网络威胁通知，以保护用户免受监控威胁。【原文：Apple has sent a new round of cyber threat notifications to users in 84 countries, the company said on Friday of its latest efforts to insulate customers against surveillance threats.】

item.title: 中国直播中的头像和有影响力的人物帮助推动利洁时在新兴市场的增长
item.description: 影响者和人工智能生成的头像在中国的直播应用程序上销售从杜蕾斯安全套到Harpic洁厕剂等各种产品，推动了消费品公司利洁时在新兴市场的增长。【原文：Influencers and AI-generated avatars selling everything from Durex condoms to Harpic toilet cleaner on livestreaming apps in China are propelling emerging-market led growth for consumer goods company Reckitt .】

item.title: Meta 与新闻出版商达成多项人工智能协议
item.description: Meta 公司周五表示，已与《今日美国》、People Inc、CNN、福克斯新闻、The Daily Caller、Washington Examiner 和《世界报》等新闻出版商达成了多项商业人工智能数据协议。【原文：Meta has struck several commercial AI data agreements with news publishers including USA Today, People Inc, CNN, Fox News, The Daily Caller, Washington Examiner and Le Monde, the company said on Friday.】
